creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: woman in green kimono with red jacket leads an unwilling little boy through a temple gate; large cherry tree at LR with pink blossoms against a pink sky; green foliage in background
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seal 

Margin LLC, in grey: [Cherry Blossoms by the Gate]; botto
title: Cherry Blossoms by the Gate
